bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Authority to set or increase fees

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 124.1 (2) [interim authority — fees for transition to Act] of the Act, the College of Applied Biology is prescribed.

For the purposes of restricting under section 124.1 (3) (b) of the Act the authority of an affected council to set or increase an annual fee under section 124.1 (2) of the Act, the following rates of increase over the annual fee payable for the previous year are prescribed:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: if the affected council has not previously set or increased the annual fee under section 124.1 (2) of the Act, 25%;
